### <i class="fa fa-user"></i> **About Me**

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am an applied economist focusing on **causal inference** and **energy modelling**. <br>

My main interest are: <br>

- Studying urban policies to decrease environmental degradation
- The welfare & justice effects of environmental externalities and market failure
- The effects of net-zero scenarios on air pollution and equity <br>
